title: 24/7 online dermatologist
description:
Welcome to dermanostic - your dermatologist always with you! 

Ready for healthy skin, without long waiting times and conveniently from anywhere? The dermanostic app is your personal dermatologist who is there for you 24/7 - no appointment, no waiting time. Discover an innovative digital dermatological practice that has already successfully treated over 200,000 patients! 

What we offer: 
- Your skin problem solved: Whether acne, neurodermatitis or nail fungus - our experienced dermatology specialists are ready to solve your skin problems. 


- Skin analysis via AI: free and innovative! 
Take a selfie and let our AI analyse the condition of your skin. Receive personalised recommendations for the right skincare - at no cost! 

- Content area for your skin health:
Deepen your knowledge with blog posts, videos and encyclopaedia articles about skin. Your skincare, your knowledge - all in one place. 

How it works: Your path to healthy skin
1. photos & questionnaire: 
Take photos and answer a short questionnaire - from the comfort of your own home. 

2. diagnosis & therapy: 
Receive a doctor's letter with diagnosis, therapy and private prescription from our dermatologists within a maximum of 24 hours. 

3. aftercare & queries: 
Ask questions about your treatment or receive follow-up prescriptions directly via the app. Our medical team is always at your side! 

Why dermanostic: 
- Experienced dermatology specialists 
- Always open: Mon - Sun, also on all public holidays 
- No appointment necessary 
- Made in Germany 
- TÜV certification: 100% secure data transmission 

- Over 200,000 patients already trust us! -
Download our app now and discover your path to healthy skin with dermanostic - your dermatologist always with you! 

Treatment packages - your customised dermatologist: 

Basic package (€25): 
- Everything you need included: diagnosis, therapy, private prescription and a consultation. 
- Fast help: You will receive your personalised treatment plan from our dermatologists within a maximum of 24 hours. 

Standard package (45€): 
- Customised skin care plan: In addition to the basic services, you will receive a personalised skincare plan. Our dermatologists will help you find the perfect skin routine. 
- Product recommendations: We recommend suitable products for your skin condition and skin types to maximise the effectiveness of your skincare routine.

Premium package (€73): 
- Everything from Basic + Standard: diagnosis, therapy, private prescription, consultation, customised skincare plan and product recommendations. 
- Premium enquiry support: Get priority treatment support and quick answers to your questions. 
- Faster treatment time: Your concerns are processed with the highest priority. 
- Medical follow-up: Review your treatment progress within 6 weeks. 
- Necessary follow-up prescriptions: Your medical care is included. 

 Your path to radiant skin starts now! Choose your perfect treatment package and experience dermanostic premium care. 

Your trust is important to us! If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact us. The easiest way to reach us is via social media or email.

With over 200,000 patients, we have treated a wide variety of skin problems, including 
- acne 
- Assessment of moles (naevus) 
- Neurodermatitis (atopic dermatitis) 
- rosacea 
- hand eczema 
- Irritant-toxic dermatitis 
- Pityriasis (Pityriasis versicolor) 
- Psoriasis (psoriasis vulgaris) 
- Nail fungus (onychomycosis) 

Important note: The dermanostic app must not be used in acute life-threatening situations, emergencies and allergic reactions with respiratory distress.

More info: 
www.dermanostic.com 
info@dermanostic.com 
dermanostic | Your online dermatologist and dermatologist via app. You will receive your doctor's letter with diagnosis, treatment recommendation and private prescription within 24 hours.

summary: Skin problem? Prescription, diagnosis and therapy from skin doctor in 24h
